alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 1:40PM MST until December 23 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches below 6000 feet and up to 6 inches across the mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph may create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Teton Valley including Driggs south through the Caribou Range to the Bear Lake Valley including Montpelier. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Teton Valley
